font.span: Our school district, in collaboration with the community, will provide our students with the opportunity for success in the 21st century, through a challenging curriculum in a safe and caring environment.

h3.a: Alternative schedule "What If" for our 2020 Graduates

div.span: As we continue to adjust our schedule, we believe it’s important to relay information in regards to the upcoming senior events.
We are announcing the following dates for the 2020 graduates:

b.span: Should we return to school on May 4:
If the school year is CANCELED:

h3.a: Packet drop off and new packet information

span.div: Packet drop off and new packet pick up has been rescheduled for Monday, April 13, 2020 from 8:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. and 3:00 p.m. - 6:00 p.m. All new assignments are also available online for you to print at home if you prefer.
East: Kindergarten at the gym entrance; 1st grade at the main entrance; 2nd grade at the second grade entrance
West: 3rd grade at the gym entrance; 4th grade at the main entrance; 5th grade at the fifth grade entrance
FMS: pick up and drop off at the main entrance
FHS: drop off at the student entrance on the gym side and pick up at the main entrance
Please make sure all assignments are returned in a large envelope or storage bag and your child's name is on each page.

h3.a: CHANGE in SCHEDULE Grab & go meal bags available Monday & Wednesday

span.div: We continue to offer bagged meals to the children in our district Monday & Wednesday from 11:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. at Fairland West. There will be no need to get out of your car. Monday's bag will contain meals for Monday and Tuesday. Wednesday's bag will contain meals for the remainder of the week. We will be set up for drive through pick up. If you have questions please call 740-886-3100 or 740-886-3101 and leave a message.

If your financial situation has changed you may be eligible for Free or Reduced Meals. Contact the school to obtain a paper applicaiton or apply online. http://www.myfreedomcafe.com/Fairland. To create an account click the Sign up link.

span.span: Your child may experience increased stress during this time. Increased anxiety, inattention and a decrease in focus are some examples of typical stress responses. If you observe these responses, it is important to monitor them closely to be sure they do not interfere with your child’s daily functioning.

span.div: Our upcoming Board meeting will be held as a virtual meeting live on Armstrong channel 203 at 6:00 pm. Public participation will not be on the agenda. If you have any questions please email [email protected] prior to April 13th.

h3.a: Fairland High School presents the district newspaper

blockquote.p: E~Funds For Schools allows parents a payment option for meals. Not only do you have the ability to have school payments automatically withdrawn electronically from your checking account or charged to your credit card, you also have the flexibility to pay at anytime through the school's website.
